entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:08 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 03:39 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -16.3°C
Wind: W 23 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
